#summary A cross-platform media player remote-control interface for Firefox and Internet Explorer.

= Introduction =

FoxyTunes is a proprietary Firefox and Internet Explorer add-on currently maintained by Yahoo!. It is not open-source. FoxyTunes is cross-platform and supports a wide array of media players.

= Details =

PsyMP3 works fairly well with FoxyTunes. Full song identification is supported. Album art works in some cases.
